headline: Bank of America Says Buy the Dip in These 2 ‘Strong Buy’ Stocks
summary: Market swings come and go, but at the end of the day, individual stocks rise and fall based on their own fundamentals. Savvy investors know that tuning out the noise of macro trends allows them to zero in on the promising opportunities. That mindset is especially useful when hunting for bargains – stocks that have taken a hit but aren’t out for the count. Some shares slip for any number of reasons, yet Wall Street’s analysts still see them as Strong Buys. In other words, they’re temporarily unde
